test.query: SELECT count() FROM hits_10m_single WHERE NOT ignore(MobilePhoneModel)
SELECT count() FROM hits_10m_single WHERE NOT ignore(SearchPhrase)
SELECT count() FROM hits_10m_single WHERE NOT ignore(URL)
SELECT count() FROM hits_10m_single WHERE NOT ignore(Referer)
SELECT count() FROM hits_10m_single WHERE NOT ignore(Title)
SELECT count() FROM hits_10m_single WHERE CounterID <= 10000 AND NOT ignore(MobilePhoneModel, SearchPhrase, URL, Referer, Title)
